cab.content:
This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.
G.T.6245
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - ?th NOVEMBER,1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
MAUBEU?E has been captured, and our troops are aslo pushing on to the South. Futher North we are across the SCHELDT between CONDE and HOLLAIN and are advancing without much opposition.
The enemy still holds? the East half of TOURNAI.
We have also crossed the SCHELDT Canal North of TOURNAI between HERINNES and BERCHEM.
French Front.
The advance of the French Armies continues, and they now hold? the West bank of the MEUSE from BAZEILLES to MEZIERES.
East of the MEUSE considerable progress has also been made by the American Army, which is now on the general line :-
FLABAS - DAMVILLERS - PEUVILLERS - BRANDEVILLE - MOUZAY.
OTHER FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
9th November, 1918.
Issued at 12.15
